description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Balanced, Power Field

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Power Sword of the Red Scorpions Chapter. Weapon Ignores the Power Field Quality of other weapons, when used to Parry an attack it has a 75% chance to destroy the attacking weapon regardless of whether it had a Power Field or not.
